summary: The modern-day descendant of Little Red Riding Hood brings her fianc√© home to meet her family and reveal their occupation as werewolf hunters, but after he is bitten by a werewolf, she must protect him from her own family.
cast: Felicia Day|Kavan Smith|Stephen McHattie|Greg Bryk|Rosemary Dunsmore|David Reale|Carlyn Burchell|Kevin Power|Argiris Karras|Joan Grisson|Victoria Robertson|David Schaaf|Thalia Stefaniuk|Scott Hilton|Michael Luckett|Andelle Posival|Robert Nolan|Jessica Phillips|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Tori Bailey
title: Cazadores de hombres lobo
